video.title: Hasta Que el Dinero nos Separe
video.synopsis: Alejandra and Rafael meet under unusual circumstances and slowly, unexpectedly end up falling in love.

seasons.title: Hasta Que el Dinero nos Separe

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra prepares for her wedding. Rafael has a bad day and ends up colliding with Alejandra while distracted.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Shaken by the situation, Rafael decides to take Alejandra to the hospital. In her absence, the wedding is canceled.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Marco won't rest until the person responsible for Alejandra's accident is behind bars.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra comes out of the anesthesia and remembers the earrings she left, not to mention that her wedding was canceled.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Rafael must pay Alejandra, who's now awake and full of anger, 4.5 million to get out of jail.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Rafael is released, but Vicky's still worried about him. Alejandra is discharged from the hospital. Claudia gets a job thanks to her attributes.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Jorge wants to sell the house in order to help his daughter. Rafael looks for work. Alejandra worries about her economic situation.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Rafael gets mixed up in a dirty business deal. Alejandra wants to return to work in order to keep her father from having to sell the house.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra escapes from her house and shows up at Auto Siglo, where everyone's surprised to see her. Rafael considers asking Alejandra for help.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Rafael decides to ask Alejandra for a job as a car salesman but might not get the answer he's looking for.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Claudia seduces her coworker out of his commission. Rafael thinks of marrying Vicky in order to get out of debt.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Marco tells Alejandra to hire Rafael, who proposes to Vicky only to regret having done so after learning that Alejandra's going to offer him the job.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra trains Rafael. Marco tells Alejandra everything is set for their wedding a month away. Chavez and Marco continue with their dirty dealings.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Rafael's envious coworkers steal the client list Alejandra gave him. Julieta is shocked to see her friend's house.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Vicky blackmails Rafael's mom in order to get her hands on his work number. Claudia keeps Rafael from noticing his client list is missing.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Jorge's in critical condition. Rafael goes with Alejandra to close a business deal. Marco's thrilled to drive Alejandra's new car.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Marco leaves Alejandra wanting more. Julieta asks Pepeto for help selling her brother's bottles. Rafael finds out his client list has been stolen.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Rafael tells Alejandra that her colleagues stole her list, but they deny it. Jorge decides to take off in his car despite his illness.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Rafael learns that Marco is mistreating Alejandra and Claudia steals a sale from him. Meanwhile, Auto Siglo throws a party to unveil the new Mustang.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Marco gets himself in trouble when Alejandra catches him at his apartment with his lover. Rafael and Vicky's romantic night together is ruined.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Marco threatens to take Rafael's house from him. Alejandra asks Susi for money to buy Marco an expensive pen. Marino and Rafael butt heads.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Rafael makes Alejandra see that her boyfriend doesn't appreciate her. Vicky is furious to learn that her boyfriend has to work every weekend.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra is crushed when Marco forgets their anniversary. Jorge nearly catches his son-in-law cheating on his daughter.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Rafael has to sell a car by the end of the day. Alejandra tells Marco he forgot their anniversary. Vicky shows up at Auto Siglo to talk to Rafael.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Marino tries to ruin Rafael's sale. Alejandra unknowingly gives Marco permission to take off with Karen. Rafael wins his bet with Marino.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Unfortunately for Marco, Karen's uncle meets with Alejandra and exposes his lies. Marino gets a haircut. Rafael takes Alejandra home.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Karen asks Marco to break up with Alejandra. Rafael tells Vicky they need to slow down with the wedding. Alejandra asks Marco for more attention.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Rafael goes out in search of clients. Alejandra has to leave the country for one month in order to recover. Alejandra is stood up by Marco again.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Chavez makes Karen afraid of Marco. Jorge wants to sell the family property in order to pay for Alejandra's operation. Rafael tries to sell a truck.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Karen blackmails Marco into going to her uncle's farewell. Julieta retrieves the furniture pawned by her family.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Julieta was swindled with the bottles. Rafael asks to borrow a truck to go close his big sale and Alejandra goes with him.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra is annoyed that Rafael took her to a wedding to make a sale. Marco is jealous of Rafael.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Chavez tells Karen that Marco tried to kill Alejandra. Rafael sings at the wedding. Beltrán gets nervous when Alejandra doesn't show up.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra and Rafael get drunk and sing, and he decides to leave the truck at the party. Marco then wants an explanation from her.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Julieta confesses to Rafael that she lost the bottles in a scam. It turns out the entire staff has been gossipping about Rafael and the boss.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Marco calls Rafael's mother to threaten her. Meanwhile, Rafael sells a fleet of trucks and gets kudos from Alejandra.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Marco gets himself into trouble with Urdiales. Rafael is upset over being banned.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Marino is jealous of Rafael. Alejandra has to pocket 4,000 pesos in order to cover the debt. Claudia flirts with Rafael.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Doña Dolores shows up to collect. Rafael attacks Marco for messing with his mom and talks to Don Gastón about his intentions with Vicky.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra makes the rules clear before leaving. Beltrán demands that Rafael dress better; Alejandra buys him cloths and gives him money to survive.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra makes Rafael promise to sell whatever he has to pay off his debt. Marco takes care of Jorge in Alejandra's absence.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Rafael bids farewell very affectionately before Alejandra undergoes the operation. Back at the dealership, no one is meeting sales targets.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Rafael tries to sell cars at a mass. Alejandra gives her all in order to recover. Don Aurelio and his daughters invite Rafael to a party.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Vicky reaches the age of 15 and causes a scene in front of Rafael. Rafael drinks it up with possible clients. Alejandra's therapy ends.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Vicky tells Rafael about her plans for the wedding. Marco has woman problems. Alejandra comes from abroad.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra returns more beautiful than ever and is surprised to see that Rafael was the month's biggest seller.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra decides to scold her workers. Vicky wants to go to Cancun for the honeymoon. Pepeto helps Rafael sell his car.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Rafael notices that his boss isn't happy to hear he's getting married. Beltrán scolds Alejandra for mistreating her salespeople.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Medina helps some nuns whose truck has broken down. Alejandra demands that her wedding take place at the family home.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: Vicky and Rafael's family goes on a picnic, only to have their afternoon ruined by a lion. Marco takes Alejandra and her family to the zoo.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: The Auto Siglo employees take out their hatred for Alejandra on a doll with her face on it. Alejandra finds out everyone hates her.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra wants to quit. Jiménez visits a sex therapist. Rafael sees Alejandra's boyfriend with another woman.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: Rafael says goodbye to his car. Susi tells Alejandra she needs to have sex. Marco gets himself in trouble again.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: Doña Dolores throws a dance contest. Chavez takes some exotic dancers to the house without knowing Jorge is there. Rafael and Claudia win the contest.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: Now that they're going to sleep together, Marco acts strangely with Alejandra. Rafael and his family say goodbye to Pantera.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra is surprised Marco didn't invite Urdiales to the wedding. Rafael wants to make a sales pitch to the director of Refri Transportes.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: Dandi and Susi have a date. Rafael manages to speak with Lemet. Beltrán doesn't want Alejandra to marry.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra congratulates Rafael when Lemet asks for a quote on 70 units. Beltrán agrees to the 4% discount. Julieta has a new suitor: Jordi.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: If Rafael can sell 70 cars, his commision will cover the debt he owes Alejandra. She asks him to quit the job if he achieves it.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: Vicky and Marco become upset when they learn Rafael will be leaving the city. Don Gastón puts his kids in order. Rafael gets nervous on the flight.
episodes.title: Episode 60

episodes.synopsis: Rafael sees the sea for the first time. Alejandra and Rafael share a hotel room. Dandi agrees to go to one of Susi's weird ritual ceremonies.
episodes.title: Episode 61

episodes.synopsis: Rafael and Alejandra enjoy the beach together. Flores wants to gain the upper hand before closing the deal with Alejandra. Beltrán defends Medina.
episodes.title: Episode 62

episodes.synopsis: Medina nearly drowns. Marco invites Claudia out for a few drinks after she flirts with him. Alejandra and Rafael pretend to be married.
episodes.title: Episode 63

episodes.synopsis: Marco and Vicky become upset when they learn their significant others will be staying another day in Puerto Vallarta.
episodes.title: Episode 64

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra becomes upset when Rafael goes out partying with her friends. Dandi refuses to give up on Susana. Alejandra and Rafael close the deal.
episodes.title: Episode 65

episodes.synopsis: Marino tells everyone Rafael and Alejandra are having an affair. Doña Leonor can't stand Vicky's attitude. Rafael and Alejandra free some lobsters.
episodes.title: Episode 66

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra and Rafael decide to stay longer at Playa Bonita.
episodes.title: Episode 67

episodes.synopsis: Vicky cries on Jaime's shoulder and they end up kissing. Marco plays the victim with his father-in-law, and later has an intimate moment with Claudia.
episodes.title: Episode 68

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra feels bad about what happened with Rafael, but he's in the clouds over it. He tells Jaime all about what happened between him and the boss.
episodes.title: Episode 69

episodes.synopsis: Vicky continues to seduce Jaime. Rafael arrives at Puerto Vallarta. Alejandra keeps Medina's shirt as a souvenir.
episodes.title: Episode 70

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra asks Rafael to write a letter of resignation. Claudia becomes very nervous when her boss asks what she was doing on the 22nd.
episodes.title: Episode 71

episodes.synopsis: Rafael becomes upset when his coworkers say he slept with the boss. Marino wants Medina and Alejandra fired.
episodes.title: Episode 72

episodes.synopsis: Marco finds out about Alejandra pretending to be Medina's wife. Everyone's crushed by Rafael's departure.
episodes.title: Episode 73

episodes.synopsis: Rafael tells Alejandra he wants to run away together. Marco and Alejandra's wedding is again canceled.
episodes.title: Episode 74

episodes.synopsis: Marco's in love with Alejandra. Dandi finds out Claudia was behind the wedding being canceled.
episodes.title: Episode 75

episodes.synopsis: Rafael puts off the wedding with Vicky, leaving Jorge not at all happy. Marco tells Claudia about what happened between Alejandra and Rafael.
episodes.title: Episode 76

episodes.synopsis: Rafael puts Ledesma in his place and it seems Pepeto has gotten Rafa a job. Chavez wants Marco back together with Alejandra.
episodes.title: Episode 77

episodes.synopsis: Chavez gets Marco to rally and go after Alejandra. Beltrán blames Alejandra for the failed business deal with Refri Transportes.
episodes.title: Episode 78

episodes.synopsis: Marino starts a rumor about Alejandra and Rafael. Israel tells the boss what everyone's saying about her.
episodes.title: Episode 79

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra thinks Rafael slandered her and never wants to see him again. Marco serenades Alejandra. Julieta kisses Jaime.
episodes.title: Episode 80

episodes.synopsis: Vicky leads Jaime to believe he slept with her. Rafael receives the letter of recommendation in the mail. Jorge is back in critical condition.
episodes.title: Episode 81

episodes.synopsis: Medina starts work at Cloautos. Marino trains Cetina. Marco tells Alejandra he's to blame for her father's heart attack.
episodes.title: Episode 82

episodes.synopsis: Nelson lands in trouble after helping an ex. Marco asks Chavez to check into the hospital. Susana agrees to help the Auto Siglo employees.
episodes.title: Episode 83

episodes.synopsis: Jaime asks Julieta to be his girlfriend, causing Rafael to become upset. Chavez blackmails Mr. Quintana into keeping his mouth shut.
episodes.title: Episode 84

episodes.synopsis: Don Gastón lends Rafael money to pay off his debt with Marco. Jorge checks out of the hospital. Alejandra goes to work despite her father's condition.
episodes.title: Episode 85

episodes.synopsis: Marino is salesman of the month again, Rafael cancels his debt with Don Gastón and Susana discovers Nelson had put a bet on her.
episodes.title: Episode 86

episodes.synopsis: Susana catches Nelson with another woman. Marco and Chavez hire an exotic dancer to be Jorge's nurse.
episodes.title: Episode 87

episodes.synopsis: Nelson suffers over Susana. Rubí begins work as Jorge's nurse. Rafael presents his sales strategy at Cloautos.
episodes.title: Episode 88

episodes.synopsis: Jorge is thrilled with his new nurse. Meanwhile, Rafael will do anything to destroy Auto Siglo, and Vicky is jealous of Jaime.
episodes.title: Episode 89

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra and her aunt don't like the way Rubí is treating Jorge. Nelson tells Susana he's sorry. Rafael plans to offer discounts.
episodes.title: Episode 90

episodes.synopsis: Rafael steals an important sale from Marino. Meanwhile, Beltrán is going to dock Alejandra's salary to pay the workers.
episodes.title: Episode 91

episodes.synopsis: Rafael wants to start a life with Vicky. Alejandra and Rubi have an argument.
episodes.title: Episode 92

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra decides to get back together with Marco. Marino and his boss work on closing a deal. Vicky causes Julieta to doubt Jaime's faithfulness.
episodes.title: Episode 93

episodes.synopsis: Rafael butts heads with Alejandra over a deal. Rubí manages to separate Jorge from his family. Beltrán asks Alejandra to resign.
episodes.title: Episode 94

episodes.synopsis: Rafael feels bad for hurting Alejandra. Jiménez tells Beltrán to give Marino Alejandra's job. Doña Arcadia shows up at Auto Siglo.
episodes.title: Episode 95

episodes.synopsis: Rafael rejects Mónica. Jorge's condition worsens in the absence of his nurse. Rubí asks Marco for money. Alejandra struggles to find work.
episodes.title: Episode 96

episodes.synopsis: Marco makes Alejandra think Medina's to blame for her failures. Marino gets ahead of himself and starts giving orders.
episodes.title: Episode 97

episodes.synopsis: Marco asks Rubí to come back and take care of Jorge. Alejandra says goodbye to the salesmen. Ismael asks Beltrán not to fire Alejandra.
episodes.title: Episode 98

episodes.synopsis: Beltrán is looking for Medina. Rafael turns down an offer from Arcadia to become the manager of Auto Siglo. Alejandra fires Cetina.
episodes.title: Episode 99

episodes.synopsis: Rafael quits his job at Cloautos. Later on, Marco confronts him once again. Jiménez rebels against his wife.
episodes.title: Episode 100

episodes.synopsis: Jiménez brings some friends home for the first time. Rafael tells his family that he's planning on returning to Auto Siglo, but Vicky's against it.
episodes.title: Episode 101

episodes.synopsis: Nelson manages to get Susana back. Meanwhile, Marco fights with a guy for coming onto Alejandra. Vicky blackmails Rafael with suicide.
episodes.title: Episode 102

episodes.synopsis: The employees at Auto Siglo are surprised when Rafael returns as manager. Marino wants to quit. Marco tells Rosario the house is going to be seized.
episodes.title: Episode 103

episodes.synopsis: Marino tells Beltrán that Rafael and Alejandra had an affair. Claudia is looking for Marco so she can seduce him.
episodes.title: Episode 104

episodes.synopsis: Rafael tells Alejandra that Marco tried twice to corner him. Meanwhile, Vicky goes after Alejandra and intends to threaten her.
episodes.title: Episode 105

episodes.synopsis: Jorge asks Rafael to stay away from his daughter and insists that Marco and Alejandra not take advantage of Medina. Vicky and Susana have a fight.
episodes.title: Episode 106

episodes.synopsis: Rafael is starting to make things difficult for his ex-boss. Alejandra shows him the incriminating photo that Vicky left as a threat.
episodes.title: Episode 107

episodes.synopsis: Rafael blames Marino for starting the gossip about the trip to Playa Hermosa. Beltrán sends Alejandra and Rafael to a Grupo Celeste cocktail party.
episodes.title: Episode 108

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra and Rosario try to get Jorge out of the house. Rubí tells Marco she'll quit dancing and move in with Jorge.
episodes.title: Episode 109

episodes.synopsis: Vicky tells Jaime she's pregnant with his baby. Rafael tells Beltrán that Marian Celeste plans to sell Auto Siglo.
episodes.title: Episode 110

episodes.synopsis: Auto Siglo celebrates its 12th anniversary. Jorge refuses Rubí's help saying he'll never let anyone take María Consuelo's place.
episodes.title: Episode 111

episodes.synopsis: Marian Celeste invites Rafael to her estate, and Marco proposes a trip to Iraq to Rubí. Doña Arcadia has a talk with Alejandra and Rafael.
episodes.title: Episode 112

episodes.synopsis: Quintana asks for hush money from Marco. Meanwhile, everyone stays on at the Auto Siglo cocktail party and Jorge asks Marco to rehire Azucena.
episodes.title: Episode 113

episodes.synopsis: Generala gets Jiménez to dance and even manages to steal a kiss. Meanwhile, Vicky arrives unannounced at the Auto Siglo cocktail party.
episodes.title: Episode 114

episodes.synopsis: Rubí heads to Iraq. Someone tries to kill Quintana. Everyone at Auto Siglo is talking about the cocktail party. Marian arrives for Rafael.
episodes.title: Episode 115

episodes.synopsis: Marino threatens Ramirez to keep him from telling everyone about the beating. Alejandra is jealous and arrives unexpectedly at Marian's estate.
episodes.title: Episode 116

episodes.synopsis: Vicky demands to know where Rafael is. Marian lets Alejandra know they don't need her to close the deal. Alejandra faints.
episodes.title: Episode 117

episodes.synopsis: Rafael kisses Alejandra and she breaks up with Marco. Jaime goes crazy when he discovers Rafael may end things with Vicky.
episodes.title: Episode 118

episodes.synopsis: While Rafael tries to finish things with Vicky, Alejandra tells Rosario that she's not marrying Marco. Julieta and Jaime sneak off for some fun.
episodes.title: Episode 119

episodes.synopsis: Rosaura doesn't want to go on with Gabo; she won't forgive him for his infidelity. Alejandra sees an old friend and tells him about Rafael.
episodes.title: Episode 120

episodes.synopsis: Rafael attacks Guillermo in a jealous rage. Marco misses Alejandra badly. Jaime resists going further with Julieta.
episodes.title: Episode 121

episodes.synopsis: Rafael asks Alejandra to be his girlfriend. Meanwhile, Marco will have to sleep with Carmen if he wants her help in the scam.
episodes.title: Episode 122

episodes.synopsis: Rafael and Alejandra declare their love and spend a romantic night together. Julieta suspects Jaime and Vicky are up to something.
episodes.title: Episode 123

episodes.synopsis: Marco looks for revenge. Cetina tries to get rehired at Auto Siglo. Alejandra tells Rafael she loves him. Doña Leonor unwittingly helps Marco.
episodes.title: Episode 124

episodes.synopsis: Rafael makes it clear to Vicky that there's nothing between them. Marian wants to meet with Rafael in order to close the deal.
episodes.title: Episode 125

episodes.synopsis: Vicky faints. Alejandra tells Susi that Rafael is the best thing for her. Rafael says there's no way Vicky's baby is his.
episodes.title: Episode 126

episodes.synopsis: Marino treats his date dreadfully. Meanwhile, Rafael sings to Alejandra and Jorge thinks Quintana is looking for something more with Rosario.
episodes.title: Episode 127

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra demands the truth from Rafael. Alejandra's family receives a letter Marco sent to make Medina look guilty.
episodes.title: Episode 128

episodes.synopsis: Rafael tells Alejandra he can prove his innocence. Vicky uses the supposed pregnancy to blackmail Jaime.
episodes.title: Episode 129

episodes.synopsis: Marco asks Rafael to cut things off with Alejandra. Quintana tells Rosario how he feels. Rafael must lie for Marco in order to save his mother's life.
episodes.title: Episode 130

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra is disappointed with Rafael. Don Jorge wants Rafael behind bars. Don Gastón blames Rafael for Vicky's condition.
episodes.title: Episode 131

episodes.synopsis: Jaime tells Rafael that if he goes back to Vicky he'll be worse off. Rosario tells Alejandra about Quintana's confession. Rosaura can't make a sale.
episodes.title: Episode 132

episodes.synopsis: Nelson's the month's biggest seller. Rafael says he wants to leave Auto Siglo. Rafael confesses to being responsible for Alejandra's accident.
episodes.title: Episode 133

episodes.synopsis: Rafael hands over the payment to Alejandra including a bonus for the commission from Grupo Celeste.
episodes.title: Episode 134

episodes.synopsis: Marian asks Rafael to go to a meeting with her. Jorge makes a scene when Rosario goes out with Quintana.
episodes.title: Episode 135

episodes.synopsis: Marco tries to talk Alejandra out of leaving. Marian puts on a tiny bikini in order to get Rafael's attention. Jiménez asks for Rafael's help.
episodes.title: Episode 136

episodes.synopsis: Jorge still plans to fight with Quintana. Alejandra demands Rafael give her money so she won't have to see him anymore; jealousy reigns.
episodes.title: Episode 137

episodes.synopsis: Rafael hopes the bank will lend him 5 million pesos. Cetina gets hired as a detective. Alejandra speaks with Marian.
episodes.title: Episode 138

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra and Marian get drunk. Alejandra refuses to leave with Rafael. Don Gastón is willing to loan his son-in-law the money.
episodes.title: Episode 139

episodes.synopsis: Vicky thinks Rafael's hers now that her father is lending him money. Julieta tells Jaime she's late. Rafael must marry Vicky.
episodes.title: Episode 140

episodes.synopsis: Doña Arcadia spies on her employees. Alejandra can't believe Rafael paid the 4 million in cash. Betrán wants Rafael to be his partner.
episodes.title: Episode 141

episodes.synopsis: Vicky's happy to see Alejandra leave Auto Siglo. Camela blackmails Marco and tries to convince Alejandra to stay away.
episodes.title: Episode 142

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra will stop at nothing to gain control of the estate. Jorge is sure about winning the fight with Quintana.
episodes.title: Episode 143

episodes.synopsis: Jorge and Vicente agree to stop fighting. Cetina tells Rafael that Marco is carrying on a romance with a woman who works at the courthouse.
episodes.title: Episode 144

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra agrees to allow Rafael to make monthly payments. She's also not leaving Auto Siglo.
episodes.title: Episode 145

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra becomes jealous over Rafael. Marian goes with Medina to look over a business deal. Alejandra tells Vicky where to find Rafael.
episodes.title: Episode 146

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra's worried about getting Rafael in trouble. Marian invites Medina to a convention. Cetina finds out that Marco's at a hotel with Carmela.
episodes.title: Episode 147

episodes.synopsis: While Alejandra talks to Doña Leonor, Rafael goes to Vicky's house to deal with the situation and is forced to lie.
episodes.title: Episode 148

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra leaves her house along with her family. Marco has to flee and says goodbye to the Álvarez del Castillos. Ramirez celebrates a birthday.
episodes.title: Episode 149

episodes.synopsis: Marian and Rafael's flight is late. Carmela tries to seduce Jaime. Alejandra tries to cheer up Jorge. Rafael and Daniel make Marian nervous.
episodes.title: Episode 150

episodes.synopsis: Vicky heads to Rafael's house, still set on her wedding. Quintana threatens Marco for money. Rafael is back from Monterrey.
episodes.title: Episode 151

episodes.synopsis: Cetina tells Rafael that Alejandra is living with Marco. Alejandra plans to marry Marco to get back at Rafael.
episodes.title: Episode 152

episodes.synopsis: Rafael is sure Carmela and Marco are involved in a dirty business deal. The Auto Siglo employees party with Germán.
episodes.title: Episode 153

episodes.synopsis: Marino will have to transfer three sales to Nelson. Rafael gets his old Panther back.
episodes.title: Episode 154

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra wants to know who told Claudia about the wedding. Rosaura tells Rafael that Marco met Alejandra because he's the family lawyer.
episodes.title: Episode 155

episodes.synopsis: Rosario asks her to look into Urdiales address. What secrets will Alejandra uncover?
episodes.title: Episode 156

episodes.synopsis: Rafael talks Beltrán into giving Medina and Alejandra another month of employment.
episodes.title: Episode 157

episodes.synopsis: Vicky shows Jaime the pregnancy test. Marino tells Jiménez that Medina never went to school and that her resume is a fake.
episodes.title: Episode 158

episodes.synopsis: Marian offers Rafael a job in her company. Rubí returns from Iraq to make Marco and Chavez pay for what they did.
episodes.title: Episode 159

episodes.synopsis: Nelson assures Susana that he's never let her down. Jorge cheers up when he sees Rubí. Rafael tells Alejandra Marco has been blackmailing him.
episodes.title: Episode 160

episodes.synopsis: Marino is interested in a woman for the first time. Nelson serenades Susana.
episodes.title: Episode 161

episodes.synopsis: Rafael tells his mother he only has one more month of work at Auto Siglo. Alejandra won't get married in a church. Marco doesn't want any more delays.
episodes.title: Episode 162

episodes.synopsis: Nelson is willing to help Rafael if it means getting Susana back. Meanwhile, Vicky arrives at Auto Siglo to pass out her wedding invitations.
episodes.title: Episode 163

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra begs Rafael not to get married. The Álvarez del Castillos arrive home at their estate, and Marian shows up at Auto Siglo.
episodes.title: Episode 164

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra becomes jealous when Marian brings a client to Medina. Chavez and Marco discover the house is haunted.
episodes.title: Episode 165

episodes.synopsis: Marian gets offended when Rafael doesn't give her the answer she was expecting. Carmela tries to seduce Nelson.
episodes.title: Episode 166

episodes.synopsis: Vicky shows up at Rafael's bachelor party. Marco wants Jorge to go to Switzerland to find out if he has an account.
episodes.title: Episode 167

episodes.synopsis: Julieta makes it clear to Rafael that she'll get a job soon. Marino gets in a fight with Pepeto. Rafael tells Alejandra that Marian offered him work.
episodes.title: Episode 168

episodes.synopsis: Susana sees Nelson kissing another woman. Marco tells Alejandra Urdiales won't make it to the wedding.
episodes.title: Episode 169

episodes.synopsis: Rafael and Alejandra wish each other luck in their marraiges. Manrrique and Jorge are off to Switzerland. Ramirez patches things up with his mom.
episodes.title: Episode 170

episodes.synopsis: Vicky makes it clear to Marian that she's going to marry Rafael. Alejandra pays no attention to the wedding preparations. Alejandra says goodbye.
episodes.title: Episode 171

episodes.synopsis: Rafael and Vicky are at the alter but Vicky faints before she can say, "I do." Alejandra blows off steam at a bar.
episodes.title: Episode 172

episodes.synopsis: Don Gastón is ashamed of Vicky and calls off the wedding. Doña Leonor asks Jaime to stay away from the family.
episodes.title: Episode 173

episodes.synopsis: Don Gastón tries to console his daughter. Rafael asks Nelson to convince Susana to return to work.
episodes.title: Episode 174

episodes.synopsis: Rafael asks Susana to stop Alejandra's wedding, but to no avail; she and Marco are married. Don Gastón demands that his son bring him Medina.
episodes.title: Episode 175

episodes.synopsis: Beltrán tells Marino Alejandra and Medina will continue working at Auto Siglo. Marian tries to get on Julieta's good side by getting her friend a job.
episodes.title: Episode 176

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra is in no mood to celebrate her wedding. Ramirez tells Marino's wife that his new partner is Sandra. Rafael and Nelson are in a bind.
episodes.title: Episode 177

episodes.synopsis: Susana tells Alejandra that Rafael didn't get married. Rafael tells Vicky's brothers he won't be able to pay his debt. Jaime tells Julieta he's sorry.
episodes.title: Episode 178

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra talks to her mother's portrait. Marco and Vicky bump into each other at the psychologist's office, and Rafael and Marian go to Monterrey.
episodes.title: Episode 179

episodes.synopsis: Rafael gives a moving speech, making Marian even more smitten. Doña Arcadia wants to hold Alejandra's wedding celebration in Cuernavaca.
episodes.title: Episode 180

episodes.synopsis: Rafael asks Alejandra if she's happy with Marco. Daniel tries to compete with Medina for Marian's love. Jorge becomes lost while returning to Mexico.
episodes.title: Episode 181

episodes.synopsis: Rafael calls Marco a parasite. Quintana is confused about his feelings for Rosario. Jorge doesn't want to reveal how much money he has in Switzerland.
episodes.title: Episode 182

episodes.synopsis: Marco will see a psychologist about his sexual problem and Jiménez is going back to work as an architect. Marian agrees to go out with Daniel.
episodes.title: Episode 183

episodes.synopsis: Vicky goes after Rafael again. Meanwhile, Daniel proposes to Marina, and Jorge insists that Alejandra is unhappy in her marraige.
episodes.title: Episode 184

episodes.synopsis: Julieta doesn't know if she should tell Rafael that Marian was proposed to, but Daniel makes sure he finds out anyway.
episodes.title: Episode 185

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra nearly catches Marco kissing Claudia. Susana forgives Nelson. Rosaura kisses Pepeto again.
episodes.title: Episode 186

episodes.synopsis: Julieta catches Jaime with Vicky. Marco is offended when Alejandra asks him about Carmela. Vicky demands Jaime help her get Rafael back.
episodes.title: Episode 187

episodes.synopsis: Julieta meets César and Jaime tells his cousin about the problem he had with Julieta. Doña Arcadia gives love advice to Jiménez.
episodes.title: Episode 188

episodes.synopsis: Marco asks Alejandra if there was ever anything between her and Rafael. Marian runs into Vicky at Rafael's house.
episodes.title: Episode 189

episodes.synopsis: David Bisbal stops by Auto Siglo. Vicky insists on wearing the wedding veil. Rafael tells Alejandra that someone cleaned out the safe.
episodes.title: Episode 190

episodes.synopsis: Doña Arcadia goes to Trancazo to find her company's sales force there. Meanwhile, Cesar invites Julieta out on a date.
episodes.title: Episode 191

episodes.synopsis: Vicky creates a scandal. Daniel courts Alejandra. Chavez tells Marco that he needs to get his wife pregnant. Pepeto invites Rosaura dancing.
episodes.title: Episode 192

episodes.synopsis: Rafael tries to get Vicky to accept that their relationship is over. Jorge and Rosario leave Marco's apartment. Daniel lures Alejandra to his cabin.
episodes.title: Episode 193

episodes.synopsis: While Daniel tries to have his way with Alejandra, Rafael takes off in search of her. Rosaura's husband gets into a fight with Pepeto.
episodes.title: Episode 194

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra gets lost in a forest and is rescued by Rafael. Marian gets back together with Daniel.
episodes.title: Episode 195

episodes.synopsis: Rafael and Alejandra come to the realization that they're lovers after spending the night together in a cabin.
episodes.title: Episode 196

episodes.synopsis: Marco and the others come upon Alejandra and Rafael kissing. Marco hides Alejandra's infidelity from his in-laws.
episodes.title: Episode 197

episodes.synopsis: Susana thinks Rafael kissed Marian. Daniel speaks very kindly of Alejandra with Doña Arcadia. Julieta agrees to go out with César.
episodes.title: Episode 198

episodes.synopsis: Marco shows up drunk at Auto Siglo looking for Alejandra. Germán tries to get along with the woman his mother chose for him.
episodes.title: Episode 199

episodes.synopsis: Cetina erases the pictures of Marco kissing Carmen. Jorge gets a loan in order to recover his property.
episodes.title: Episode 200

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra tells Rafael that she no longer plans on living with Marco. César arrives at Julieta's. Quinta threatens Marco again.
episodes.title: Episode 201

episodes.synopsis: Rafael and Alejandra end up crossing paths with their rivals at a nightclub. Claudia and Marco spend the night together.
episodes.title: Episode 202

episodes.synopsis: Vicky's afraid of the witch's prophecies. Alejandra tells Marco she wants to start divorce proceedings. Susi dreams that Nelson is cheating on her.
episodes.title: Episode 203

episodes.synopsis: Doña Arcadia overlooks Alejandra and Rafael's relationship. Ramirez and Marco want to get back at Rafael by having his mother thrown in jail.
episodes.title: Episode 204

episodes.synopsis: Nelson puts Susana's love to the test. Rafael and Alejandra find Jorge. Jaime gets a makeover.
episodes.title: Episode 205

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra ends things once and for all with Marco. Carmela makes Alejandra think she lost the house. Rafael finally sells the trucks he needs to.
episodes.title: Episode 206

episodes.synopsis: Doña Leonor is arrested. Rosaura tells Pepeto she's going back to her husband. Marian declares war against Alejandra. Rafael visits his mother.
episodes.title: Episode 207

episodes.synopsis: Rafael and Julieta are desperate over their mother's situation. Marco insists that Rafael must leave Alejandra in order for his mother to go free.
episodes.title: Episode 208

episodes.synopsis: After making a great sale, Marino demands to be named manager. Vicky asks Rafael for another opportunity. Alejandra agrees to go out with Daniel.
episodes.title: Episode 209

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra tells Rafael she doesn't feel she can trust him and that it's best to break things off. Marco agrees to Vicky's deal.
episodes.title: Episode 210

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra tells her father they'll get the house back. Julieta is surprised to learn that her mother is getting out of jail.
episodes.title: Episode 211

episodes.synopsis: Vicky tries to seduce Rafael into going to a hotel with her. Marco and Daniel argue over Alejandra. Everyone celebrates Doña Leonor's release.
episodes.title: Episode 212

episodes.synopsis: Marco gets in touch with Carmela to talk about the house. Alejandra feels bad for breaking up with Rafael.
episodes.title: Episode 213

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra and Rafael run into each other at a restaurant with their dates. Jiménez tells Marino that he's envious of the house.
episodes.title: Episode 214

episodes.synopsis: Vicente disguises himself in order to go unnoticed at the house. Julieta decides to forgive Jaime.
episodes.title: Episode 215

episodes.synopsis: Claudia asks Marco if he wants to secretly make love. Marco asks Alejandra to join him in trying to save their marriage.
episodes.title: Episode 216

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra fears Marco won't sign the divorce papers and is surprised to learn that Urdiales doesn't know Marco.
episodes.title: Episode 217

episodes.synopsis: Both Jaime and César propose to Julieta. Alejandra tells her family that Marco lied to them. Rafael pays off his debt. Cetina spies on Marco.
episodes.title: Episode 218

episodes.synopsis: Doña Arcadia scolds her employees. Vicente tells Alejandra that Marco cheated the family. Marino receives the first ultrasound of her daughter.
episodes.title: Episode 219

episodes.synopsis: Vicente tells Marco they lost the house because El Camarón betrayed them. Daniel and Marian team up to separate Rafael and Alejandra.
episodes.title: Episode 220

episodes.synopsis: Doña Leonor receives an envelope with pictures of her family in it. Doña Arcadia confronts her enemy La Leona.
episodes.title: Episode 221

episodes.synopsis: Rafael is blamed for a pregnancy. Marian becomes worried as her plan gets out of hand. Auto Siglo wins a prize for the best dealership.
episodes.title: Episode 222

episodes.synopsis: Rafael's father suddenly appears but is rejected by his son despite Marian's support.
episodes.title: Episode 223

episodes.synopsis: Jorge remembers the password to his account. Vicky and Marco clash at Pantera. Rafael's father apologizes to his family.
episodes.title: Episode 224

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra and Rafael confront Marco and Vicky to settle things once and for all. Rafael and Julieta forgive their father.
episodes.title: Episode 225

episodes.synopsis: All the girls at Auto Siglo decide to have their weddings at the same time. Alejandra and Rafael finally get married.
episodes.title: Episode 226

episodes.synopsis: Chavez agrees to go to work for Alejandra and Rafael in order to pay for what was stolen. Marco marries Vicky.
episodes.title: Episode 227
